title: JAVA开启时致命错误
author: kailong
txt_content:
#
# A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
#
#  EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x7c884fd8, pid=4420, tid=4584
#
# JRE version: Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (7.0_55-b14) (build 1.7.0_55-b14)
# Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (24.55-b03 mixed mode windows-x86 )
# Problematic frame:
# C  [kernel32.dll+0x84fd8]
#
# Failed to write core dump. Minidumps are not enabled by default on client versions of Windows
#
# If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit:
#   http://bugreport.sun.com/bugreport/crash.jsp
# The crash happened outside the Java Virtual Machine in native code.
# See problematic frame for where to report the bug.
#

有没有大神可以告诉我解决方式！QAQ

replies.txt_content:
换启动器吧
或者修改内存 试一试 改成512试一试
这个我也不懂···如果可以麻烦采纳

replies.author: kailong
replies.txt_content:
1277832129 发表于 2014-5-16 17:24
换启动器吧

升级了下驱动器就好了，但是还是谢谢你！
